main.name: Milo Thiesen
main.occupation: Expert media manager & integrations developer specializing in media workflow automation and data driven, low-code integrations
main.bio: Hey there! I'm Milo (they/them). Currently, I am the Senior Media Asset Manager in the Office of Knowledge and Legacy at Lincoln Center for the Performing Arts, Inc. For 15 years I have specialized in media archiving and digital asset management for photography, video, interactives, and animation in cultural heritage and higher education. Prior to that, I was the Lead Technical Analyst for Digital Asset Management at The Metropolitan Museum of Art for five years. I've also held positions in digital asset management at the American Museum of Natural History and the University of Massachusetts Amherst. I really enjoy knowledge sharing and sometimes I guest lecture at Pratt Institute, New York University, and the Metropolitan New York Library Council.

education.degree: Bachelor's of Fine Art, Photography & Video Installation
education.description: Focused on digital & analog photography, studio lighting, and print processes. Strong focus in media management.
